headline: AvalonBay Communities, Inc. Announces Participation in the 2025 Citi Global Property CEO Conference, Provides First Quarter 2025 Operating Update, and Publishes Updated Investor Presentation
summary: ARLINGTON, Va., February 27, 2025--AVALONBAY COMMUNITIES, INC. (NYSE: AVB) (the "Company") announced today that Benjamin W. Schall, the Company’s CEO and President, and select members of the Company’s management team will be participating in a roundtable discussion at the 2025 Citi Global Property CEO Conference on Monday, March 3, 2025, at 8:10 A.M. Eastern Time. During this event, management may discuss the Company's current operating environment and trends; development, redevelopment, disposi

headline: AVB acquires 8 Texas properties for more than $600M
summary: The purchase from BSR will help the REIT achieve its goal of having 25% of its portfolio in expansion Sun Belt markets.

headline: AvalonBay Communities Advances Portfolio Optimization Efforts Through Planned Acquisition of Eight Apartment Communities in Texas and Reaffirms Outlook
summary: ARLINGTON, Va., February 27, 2025--AvalonBay Communities, Inc. (the "Company") (NYSE: AVB) announced today that it is under contract with BSR Real Estate Investment Trust (TSX: HOM.U and HOM.UN) ("BSR REIT"), and its operating subsidiary, BSR Trust, LLC ("BSR Trust"), to acquire two apartment communities in the Austin metropolitan area (the "Austin Assets"), and that it has entered into an agreement with BSR REIT, BSR Trust, and certain holders of Class B Units of BSR Trust ("BSR Class B Units")

raw.headline: AvalonBay Communities Advances Portfolio Optimization Efforts Through Planned Acquisition of Eight Apartment Communities in Texas and Reaffirms Outlook
raw.summary: ARLINGTON, Va., February 27, 2025--AvalonBay Communities, Inc. (the "Company") (NYSE: AVB) announced today that it is under contract with BSR Real Estate Investment Trust (TSX: HOM.U and HOM.UN) ("BSR REIT"), and its operating subsidiary, BSR Trust, LLC ("BSR Trust"), to acquire two apartment communities in the Austin metropolitan area (the "Austin Assets"), and that it has entered into an agreement with BSR REIT, BSR Trust, and certain holders of Class B Units of BSR Trust ("BSR Class B Units")
